query.statement:
SELECT ZMA01.POSID ,CS121A.CS121_ZIB AS ZIB ,CS121A.CS121_P1B AS P1B ,CS121A.CS121_P2B AS P2B ,CS121A.CS121_DZIB AS DZIB /* 세금계산서수주처-우편번호(도로명) */ ,CS121A.CS121_DP1B AS DP1B /* 세금계산서수주처-우편번호(도로명) */ ,CS121A.CS121_DP2B AS DP2B /* 세금계산서수주처-우편번호(도로명) */ ,CS121A.CS121_NZIB AS NZIB
,CS121A.CS121_P1B||CS121A.CS121_P2B ADDR ,CS404_GNO GNO ,FI1071.BANKL ,FI1071.KUNNR ,CS121A.CS121_GSH KUNNR_NM ,CASE WHEN FI1071.AUART = 'ZR11' THEN '월정보수료' WHEN FI1071.AUART = 'ZR12' THEN '부품판매대금' WHEN FI1071.AUART = 'ZR13' THEN '수리공사대금' ELSE '' END AS TITLE2 ,W.ADDR2 --,W.TEL ,W.FAX --,W.SGUSR ,W.ARA_TEXT ,SAPHEE.LAST_DAY(CURRENT DATE) DUEDATE ,CS121A.EPNAME EPNAME ,0 MI_SU_F ,'' TITLE ,FI1071.BANKVN ,FI1071.AUART ,'' SEAL ,'' S004 ,'' RECEV_NM
FROM (SELECT A.CS404_PNO ,A.CS404_SEQ ,A.CS404_UPN ,A.CS404_GNO ,A.AUART ,SUBSTR(B.BNAME,7,3) AS CST
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST404 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND A.CS404_GNO = B.ZZPJT_ID
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND A.CS404_UPN = #UPN# AND A.KUNNR = #KUNNR# AND A.CS404_SEQ = #SEQ#
ORDER BY CS404_PNO DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) CS404 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 ZMA01 ON ZMA01.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ZMA01.POSID = #UPN#
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZFIT1071 FI1071 ON FI1071.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND FI1071.PSPID = #UPN# AND FI1071.KUNNR = #KUNNR# AND FI1071.AUART = CS404.AUART AND FI1071.SSGBN = '2' AND FI1071.BANKL = '011'
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DTEXT2 ADDR2 ,CASE WHEN CODE2 < 'E55' THEN '02-3670-0960' ELSE DTEXT3 END TEL ,DTEXT4 FAX ,DTEXT5 SGUSR ,CODE2 VKGRP ,CASE WHEN CODE2 < 'E55' THEN CTEXT2||'지사' ELSE CTEXT2 END ARA_TEXT FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CODE1 = 'CS181' ) W ON W.VKGRP = #VKGRP#
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 CS121A ON CS121A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS121A.CS121_UPN = CS404.CS404_UPN AND CS121A.CS121_CST = CS404.CST AND CS121A.KUNNR = #KUNNR#
WITH UR
